face_settings.face_preservation: preserve exact face structure, same facial features, same eye color, same nose, photorealistic face
face_settings.hair_preservation: natural hair only, same hair style, same hair color, no head accessories
face_settings.expression_modifier: pensive expression, slightly bigger anime-like eyes, dreamy gaze, thoughtful look, slightly larger eyes with love expression, anime influenced eye style, Roblox character style, 3D Roblox face
face_settings.body_preservation: preserve exact pose, same body position

negative_prompts.face_negative: distorted face, deformed face, bad face, multiple faces, unrealistic face, face artifacts
negative_prompts.hair_negative: weird hair, hair accessories, headpiece, crown, tiara, hat, anything on head
negative_prompts.body_negative: distorted body, bad anatomy, extra limbs, missing limbs, unrealistic proportions
negative_prompts.base_negative: nude, naked, nsfw, badly drawn face, wrong face, deformed face, extra fingers, poorly drawn fingers, blurry, bad art, poor quality, worst quality, (((duplicate))), ((morbid)), ((mutilated)), ((poorly drawn hands)), (((mutation))), (((deformed))), ((ugly)), blurry, ((bad anatomy)), (((bad proportions))), ((extra limbs)), (((disfigured))), out of frame, ugly, extra limbs, bad anatomy, cartoon, anime, illustration, painting, drawing, art, 3d render, disfigured, kitsch, oversaturated, grain, low-res, Deformed, blurry, bad anatomy, disfigured, poorly drawn face, mutation, mutated, extra limb, ugly, poorly drawn hands, missing limb, blurry, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, malformed hands, blur, out of focus, long neck, long body, distorted, bad proportions
